WHY_ME_TEXT: In every line of code, I see the chance to make the world a little better. To me, technology is more than just a tool—it creates space for something bigger. When a fleeting idea turns into a functioning product, that very process is what drives me: curiosity becomes learning, and problems become solutions.
MY_SKILL_SET_TEXT: In the dynamic world of IT, innovation and progress are inextricably linked. For me, new technologies and methods are not just tools, but springboards for fresh ideas and efficient solutions. With strategic foresight, unwavering curiosity, and a passion for lifelong learning, I continuously expand my skills – ready to actively shape the future.
MY_SKILL_SET_HOVER: Do you have an idea? Tell me which technology you have in mind.
MY_WORK_ONGOING_TEXT: I’m now diving into the world of back‑end development, expanding my toolkit with everything that happens behind the user interface: routing, databases, authentication, and testing. My goal: to transform beautiful front‑ends into complete applications—crafted single‑handedly, from the very first request to the last line of data.
CONTACT_ME_TEXT_2: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT_ME_FORM_TEXT_3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
CONTACT_FEEDBACK_SUCCESS: Your message has been sent successfully.
CONTACT_FEEDBACK_ERROR: Unfortunately, an error occurred. You can contact me directly at contact@susanne-renken.com
